original: Cederbom, Erik Hugo, kyrkolierde, Annehärad, Gullspàng, f. 28/10/91 i Södra Solberga, Jönköp. 1. G. 24 m. foI!k!sikio!l!l. Dagny Berg. BiaT’n: Inga f. 31, Kerstin 34, Gullevi BergLund (fo’S-terd.) 28. — Stud:ex. d Skara 11, teoiL kand. d Lund 17, prästv. i Skara 18. Tjg. i Eriikisberg, S. Ving, Alingsåis, Stengårdshuk, Borås, kommin. i Tor-björntorp 21-47, kyrkoh. i Annehär. fr. 47. Förste dirig. i Kyrkofsång. Vänn., ’selkr. i Västergötl. Körförb.
translated: Cederbom, Erik Hugo, church scholar, Annehärad, Gullspång, born 28/10/91 in Södra Solberga, Jönköping. Married once, for 24 years, with Dagny Berg. Children: Inga born 31, Kerstin born 34, and Gullevi BergLund (stepdaughter) born 28. He passed his final upper secondary school examination (Stud:ex.) in Skara in 1911 and earned his Bachelor of Theology degree (teoL. kand.) from Lund University in 1917. He was ordained as a priest in Skara in 1918. He served in Eriksberg, S. Ving, Alingsås, Stengårdshuk, and Borås, and was a curate in Torbjörntorp from 1921-1947. He became a vicar in Annehär. from 1947. He was the first conductor of church singing and an advocate for West Gothia Choral Association.
